description:
Mac & Drac: Play with the best, burn like the rest

Mac the magpie and Drac the dragon have spent years training their powers of fire, traveling the most remote places to find the mystical flames. When they arrived in Sant Feliu to retrieve the last of them, they ran into a big problem: Satan was about to consume the flame for himself and his army of beasts terrorized the town. Mac and Drac had to do something, and fast! 

Mac & Drac is a new concept developed by part of the Purple T Games team where we mix shoot’em up mechanics  with a dialogue system for the final execution of the enemies. Everything in a cool isometric view, mixing 2D and 3D elements and flashy neon/80s style with 100% original 2D graphics!

Gamepad required.

  • Left Stick - Movement
  • Right Stick - Shooting
  • LT - Swap of characters
  • RT - Execution mode

This prototype is part of #PowerUPJam.
